schemas.CSAS_OUTPUT_0.KsqlTopic.Source: STRUCT<ARRAY_ARRAY ARRAY<ARRAY<BOOLEAN>>, MAP_ARRAY ARRAY<MAP<VARCHAR, INT>>, STRUCT_ARRAY ARRAY<STRUCT<V BIGINT>>> NOT NULL
schemas.CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT: STRUCT<ARRAY_LEN INT, MAP_LEN INT, STRUCT_LEN INT> NOT NULL

testCase.name: array_length - structured
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ARRAY_ARRAY ARRAY<ARRAY<BOOLEAN>>, MAP_ARRAY ARRAY<MAP<STRING, INTEGER>>, STRUCT_ARRAY ARRAY<STRUCT<V BIGINT>>) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='test_topic', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT
  ARRAY_LENGTH(INPUT.ARRAY_ARRAY) ARRAY_LEN,
  ARRAY_LENGTH(INPUT.MAP_ARRAY) MAP_LEN,
  ARRAY_LENGTH(INPUT.STRUCT_ARRAY) STRUCT_LEN
FROM INPUT INPUT
EMIT CHANGES;

sources.name: INPUT
sources.schema: `ROWKEY` STRING KEY, `ARRAY_ARRAY` ARRAY<ARRAY<BOOLEAN>>, `MAP_ARRAY` ARRAY<MAP<STRING, INTEGER>>, `STRUCT_ARRAY` ARRAY<STRUCT<`V` BIGINT>>
